issue.title: sdformat install not relocatable: sdf::findFile searches original install location

content.raw: DART also had the same issue and [adopted the workaround of using the environment variable](https://github.com/dartsim/dart/pull/1095), which I believe sdformat already does. One possible solution I can think of now is searching typical install locations (like [find_package](https://cmake.org/cmake/help/v3.8/command/find_package.html) does), which are platform dependent.
